title.value: Корма и кормление – важнейшие составляющие продуктивности свиней
Feeds and feeding - the major components of pigs performance
Feeds and feeding - the major components of pigs performance

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Bezzubov, V.I., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: The basic indicators of the type of feeds and feeding pigs in conditions of industrial environments are presented, as well as the requirements to the quality of raw materials, the fineness of the grain, the structure of compound feeds, feed rate and other factors. forages make 65-70% in structure of the cost price of swine breeding products, and cumulative power inputs, depending on feeding type, - 60-85%. The need in grain of this republican branch is within the limits of 1,4-1,5 million tones in a year. Feeding gives 45-55 % of animals' productivity as the element of the

of pork production. From the physiological point of view, the optimal type of feeding for an adult livestock and feeding young growth are damp mixes (68-73%, on the average 70), and for pigs-sucklings and pigs-weanings - dry forages
